summary: A youth embarks on a journey to find his missing grandmother and prove that Santa Claus is real.
cast: Elmo Shropshire|Michele Lee|Susan Blu|Alex Doduk|Jim Staahl|Kathleen Barr|Jim Fisher|Cam Clarke|Christopher Gaze|Philip Maurice Hayes|Scott McNeil|Pauline Newstone|Maggie Blue O'Hara|Drew Reichelt|Venus Terzo|Gary Chase
keywords: christmas special|christmas|animal in title|based on song|reindeer
title: Grandma Got Run Over by a Reindeer
